snippet: Eric T. Schneiderman, the attorney general of New York State, calls on Congress to protect military families from predatory lenders.
abstract: Letter from New York Atty Gen Eric T Schneiderman responds to September 27 article proposing sweeping changes to Military Lending Act, federal law intended to shield service members from high-cost loans tied to their paychecks.
lead_paragraph: Eric T. Schneiderman, the attorney general of New York State, calls on Congress to protect military families from predatory lenders.

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject
